quote1.quote: If I had a gun with two bullets and I was in a room with Hitler, Bin Laden, and Toby, I would shoot Toby twice.

quote2.quote: Occasionally, I’ll hit somebody with my car. So sue me.

quote3.quote: Everybody stay calm! Stay f*&#!#% calm!

quote5.quote: I feel like all my kids grew up, and then they married each other. It’s every parent’s dream.

quote6.quote: Well, Happy Birthday Jesus. Sorry your party’s so lame.

quote7.quote: Sometimes I’ll start a sentence, and I don’t even know where it’s going. I just hope I find it along the way.

quote8.quote: There are certain things a boss does not share with his employees. His salary, that would depress them. His bed, it--- And I am not going to tell them that I'll be reading their e-mails.

quote10.quote: Wikipedia is the best thing ever. Anyone in the world can write anything they want about any subject so you know you are getting the best possible information.

quote11.quote: I’m an early bird and I’m a night owl so I’m wise and I have worms.

quote12.quote: It is St. Patrick's Day. And here in Scranton, that is a huge deal. It is the closest that the Irish will ever get to Christmas.

quote14.quote: I love inside jokes. I hope to be a part of one someday.

quote15.quote: You cheated on me?....When I specifically asked you not to?

quote16.quote: I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.

quote17.quote: I have cause. It is beCAUSE I hate him.

quote9=18.quote: Would I rather be feared or loved? Easy. Both. I want people to be afraid of how much they love me.

quote20.quote: No, I’m not going to tell them about the downsizing. If a patient has cancer, you don’t tell them.

quote21.quote: They say on your deathbed you never wish you spent more time at the office — but I will.

quote22.quote: I don’t understand. We have a day honoring Martin Luther King, but he didn’t even work here.

quote23.quote: Now, you may look around and see two groups here. White collar, blue collar. But I don’t see it that way. And you know why not? Because I am collar-blind.

quote24.quote: Presents are the best way to show how much you care. It’s a tangible thing you can point at and say, ‘Hey man, I love you. This many dollars worth.

quote25.quote: Toby is in HR which technically means he works for corporate. So he’s not really a part of our family. Also he’s divorced… so he’s not really a part of his family.

quote26.quote: I don’t come up with this stuff, I just forward it along. You wouldn’t arrest the guy who was just passing drugs from one guy to another.

quote27.quote: This is our receptionist, Pam. If you think she’s cute now you should have seen her a couple years ago.

quote28.quote: T took her to the hospital. And the doctors tried to save her life, they did the best they could. And she is going to be okay.

quote29.quote: It takes you thirty seconds to brush your teeth? Wow that’s ten times as long as it takes me.

quote30.quote: I want today to be a beautiful memory that the staff and I share after I have passed on to New York. And if Toby is a part of it, then it’ll suck.

quote31.quote: I hate so much about the things you choose to be.

quote32.quote: If you don’t like it, Stanley, you can go to the back of the bus…Or the front of the bus or drive the bus.

quote33.quote: I’ve got to make sure that YouTube comes down to tape this.”

quote34.quote: Nobody likes beets, Dwight! Why don’t you grow something that everybody does like? You should grow candy.
